Name: Jaime
description: My Father is a master carpenter and taught me how to make, make do, and mend from the time I was little. By instilling in me the desire to craft and create, he helped shape me as an artist and entrepreneur.  I have been an Artist and Crafter my entire life and career as a freelancer in the Film Industry.  I love how connected the fiber community is, and how exploring the different aspects of fiber production has connected me to my local community in such a strong way.
